item.title: PrestaShop + Azure: meet the team behind it all!
item.description: Our core team worked closely in the past few months with the Microsoft Azure Team to build 4 ready-to-use PrestaShop cloud hosting plans. Youâ€™re invited to discover an exclusive preview of it in Paris next week!
